languages.text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot. The wearer of this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is immune to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} as long as no party member has been {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} throughout the entire combat. Base armour property: +15% armour against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Requires: Benevolentia — Zealot. The wielder of this armour is immune to critical hits as long as no party member has been prone in combat. Base armour property: +15% armour against melee attacks.

Requires Benevolentia — Zealot. The wearer of this armour is immune to critical hits as long as no party member has been prone throughout the entire combat. Base armour property: +15% armour against melee attacks.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot. The wearer of this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is immune to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} as long as no party member has been {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} throughout the entire combat. Base armour property: +15% armour against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

languages.text: Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: Fanático El portador de esta {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} es inmune a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactos{/g} críticos mientras ningún miembro del grupo haya sido {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} en todo el combate. Propiedad básica de armadura: +15 % de armadura contra {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot. The wearer of this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is immune to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} as long as no party member has been {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} throughout the entire combat. Base armour property: +15% armour against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Necesita Benevolentia: Fanático El portador de esta {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} es inmune a {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactos{/g} críticos mientras ningún miembro del grupo haya sido {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} en todo el combate. Propiedad básica de armadura: +15 % de armadura contra {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.

languages.text: 需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——狂热者 在战斗过程中，只要没有任何队友处于{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，此{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}的装备者会免疫暴击。 基础护甲特性：对抗{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，获得+15%护甲。
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot. The wearer of this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is immune to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} as long as no party member has been {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} throughout the entire combat. Base armour property: +15% armour against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

languages.text: Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} — Zélote. L'utilisateur de cette {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} est invulnérable aux {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coups{/g} critiques à condition qu'aucun membre du groupe ne subisse l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant toute la durée du combat. Propriété d'armure de base : +15 % d'armure contre les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g}.
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot. The wearer of this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is immune to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} as long as no party member has been {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} throughout the entire combat. Base armour property: +15% armour against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Requiert Benevolentia — Zélote. L'utilisateur de cette {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} est invulnérable aux {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coups{/g} critiques à condition qu'aucun membre du groupe ne subisse l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant toute la durée du combat. Propriété d'armure de base : +15 % d'armure contre les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g}.

languages.text: Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g} – Eiferer. Der Träger dieser {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} ist immun gegen kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g}, solange kein Gruppenmitglied während des gesamten Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} wurde. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +15 % Rüstung gegen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g}.
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot. The wearer of this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is immune to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} as long as no party member has been {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} throughout the entire combat. Base armour property: +15% armour against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Erfordert Benevolentia — Eiferer. Der Träger dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} ist immun gegen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}kritische Treffer{/g}, solange kein Gruppenmitglied während des gesamten Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} wurde. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +15 % Rüstung gegen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffe{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} ― 狂信者を必要とする。 この{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}の使用者は、パーティのメンバーが戦闘中ずっと{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}していない限り、クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}の影響を無効化する。 基本アーマー特性：{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}に対してアーマー +15%
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot. The wearer of this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is immune to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} as long as no party member has been {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} throughout the entire combat. Base armour property: +15% armour against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ベネボレンティア ― 狂信者を必要とする。 この{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}の使用者は、パーティのメンバーが戦闘中ずっと {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}していない限り、クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}の影響を無効化する。 基本アーマー特性：{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}に対してアーマー +15%

languages.text: Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — апологет Этот доспех дает персонажу иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическим попаданиям{/g}, если никто из отряда ни разу за бой не оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинут{/g}. Базовое свойство: +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} против {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атак в ближнем бою{/g}.
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot. The wearer of this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is immune to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} as long as no party member has been {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} throughout the entire combat. Base armour property: +15% armour against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Требуется: Благодеяние — фанатик. Этот доспех дает персонажу иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическим попаданиям{/g}, если никто из отряда ни разу за бой не оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинут{/g}. Базовое свойство: +15% к броне против {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атак в ближнем бою{/g}.
